com.customlbs.surface.library

Class SurfacePainterConfiguration.PaintConfiguration

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.customlbs.surface.library.SurfacePainterConfiguration.PaintConfiguration
  • Enclosing class:
    SurfacePainterConfiguration

    public static class SurfacePainterConfiguration.PaintConfiguration
extends java.lang.Object
    use Integer, Boolean, Float, etc instead of primitive types because we only want to change a Paint's settings if the user intentionally set a value

      • applyTo

        public void applyTo(android.graphics.Paint paint)
        applies this PaintConfiguration to the given Paint. Only sets the values you set using the setters before - no default values!
